pages.text: $(l)Motosignir$() is a tuning fork of extraordinary quality and its form precision. $(br2)Forged to the nanometer, its whiskers create a destructive sonic wave that wreaks colossal havoc upon all living creatures within a 10-block radius, stunning them with its sheer force. $(br2)The closer the enemy is to the source of this sonic wave, the greater the devastation they endure.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: This legendary relic can only be obtained through trade with the masterful Huldra brothers, $(l)Brok and Sindri$().
